meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> contains a <radical>scroll</radical>, which you pull out and look at. On the scroll is a map, showing the <kanji>range</kanji> of the <kanji>sphere</kanji> of your mouth.
readingMnemonic: Looking at the <kanji>range</kanji> of your mouth on the map, you notice a tiny samurai marked near your molars. It is <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai.
